players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We need to vote her out today."
Charlie: "That's a bold claim Bob. If you're really the detective and Alice is mafia, then we should vote Alice. But if you're lying, you're the mafioso trying to eliminate Alice."
You: "Bob is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night - he is the mafioso. Bob must be trying to frame me."
You: "Charlie, Bob is clearly lying. I investigated you and you're innocent. Bob must be mafia trying to eliminate me. Vote Bob with me."
Charlie: "Wait Alice, you just contradicted yourself. First you said I'm the mafioso, now you're saying I'm innocent. That's very suspicious - I think you're the mafia trying to confuse us."
Bob: "Alice just contradicted herself - first said Charlie was mafia, then said he was innocent. She's clearly lying. I'm the real detective and confirmed Alice is mafia."
